title: Ticket #3518: Debug DMTCP shim for LIGO
description:
CP from UWM is trying to get the dmtcp_shim working with the "foo" test job. The jobs are exiting instantly with value 99. Investigate why.

- Current status: Can reproduce. :-/
remarks:
2013-Mar-14 11:14:01 by pfc:
Bumping up priority from 4 to 2 since anything that moves us closer to understanding how well DMCTP works for our jobs is a high priority for LIGO...

2013-Mar-25 16:26:45 by adesmet:
Appears to be a matter of changes in DMTCP packaging causing problems for the shim tools. Workaround send February 25. Updated dmtcp_condor_integration-0.5 released March 25.
creator: adesmet
